DEAR SIR/MADAME I shall endeavor, without prejudice to any one else, to explain myself. That through your attention and patronage, the merits of my elucidations will provide opportune effect and that should the time come for collaboration, our endeavour will meet with great success and that you will speak kindly of my to others.
